Text.Page:
I know Castanica is worried about durignite for their shields, but they're running short on ore needed for the war effort, too.

{@RawItem:206807} is in particularly short supply. The good news is that you don't need to excavate an entire mine to get to it. Bring me some {@RawItem:206807}, and all of Castanica will shout your praises.
With the mines shut down, Castanica is in crisis. Every little bit of {@RawItem:206807} helps, friend!
